hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Potion Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ocarina#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.
